column4: i am a jack of all trades, I wanna know ip tables, routing, hardware, graphics, programming, general knowledge,,, I went over a house for a job, guy knew linux and computers to the point I felt stupid, now I am gonna join local linux club for help,,,, I have about 4 days experience with linux
thanks for all the help ppl,,, UH cj i have 4 days experience
btw this guy gave me a book from 1997 "linux in a nutshell" is this thing still useful after so many years?
good reading material, but alot has changed.
